member.name: T:CacheCow.Server.EntityTagStore.SqlServer.SqlServerEntityTagStore
member.summary:
Implements IEntityTagStore for SQL Server 2000 and above
Relies on a table and 4 store procedures (in scripts folder)
Uses plain ADO.NET. Not worth baking dependency for the sake of 5 calls.

member.name: M:CacheCow.Server.EntityTagStore.SqlServer.SqlServerEntityTagStore.GetStoredProcedureName(System.String)
member.summary: Prefixes a stored procedure name with the configured database schema name.
member.param: The stored procedure name to format.
